data.name: Jared
data.review: Very helpful tool that is user-friendly, intuitive, and supports job seekers in their search for employment. I highly recommend it!

data.name: David
data.review: Great tool for  quickly creating compelling resumes and organizing your entire job search. Recommending to all my clients!

data.name: Kate
data.review: An easy-to-use tool that helps you create a resume and cover letter that stand out.
